editorArea:section.name: warehousingbackoffice.section.sourcingConfig.weight.factors
editorArea:section.description: Total Weight must be 100, and each Weight must not be Negative

wz:next.visible: newAddr.owner != null and !#empty(newAddr.streetname) and !#empty(newAddr.streetnumber) and !#empty(newAddr.postalcode) and newAddr.region != null and newAddr.country !=null

wz:done.visible: newAddr.owner != null and !#empty(newAddr.streetname) and !#empty(newAddr.streetnumber) and !#empty(newAddr.postalcode) and newAddr.region != null and newAddr.country !=null

wz:next.visible: newStockLevel.productCode != null and newStockLevel.warehouse != null and newStockLevel.available != null

wz:done.visible: newStockLevel.productCode != null and newStockLevel.warehouse != null and newStockLevel.available != null

wz:next.visible: newSourcingConfig.code != null and newSourcingConfig.distanceWeightFactor != null and newSourcingConfig.allocationWeightFactor != null and newSourcingConfig.priorityWeightFactor != null

wz:done.visible: newSourcingConfig.code != null and newSourcingConfig.distanceWeightFactor != null and newSourcingConfig.allocationWeightFactor != null and newSourcingConfig.priorityWeightFactor != null

wz:next.visible: !#empty(newAdvancedShippingNotice.externalId) and newAdvancedShippingNotice.pointOfService != null and newAdvancedShippingNotice.releaseDate != null

wz:done.visible: !#empty(newAdvancedShippingNotice.externalId) and newAdvancedShippingNotice.pointOfService != null and newAdvancedShippingNotice.releaseDate != null
newAdvancedShippingNoticeEntry.asn != null and !#empty(newAdvancedShippingNoticeEntry.productCode) and newAdvancedShippingNoticeEntry.quantity != null
